abstract: More than 1,200 JPMorgan employees turned out to run in the bank’s corporate challenge, but the firm’s chief executive was in a paperwork marathon at his office.
snippet: More than 1,200 JPMorgan employees turned out to run in the bank’s corporate challenge, but the firm’s chief executive was in a paperwork marathon at his office.
lead_paragraph: Inside the JPMorgan Chase hospitality tent at Wednesday evening’s corporate challenge race in Central Park, Jamie Dimon’s mythic status reached almost Olympic proportions.

headline.main: Jamie Dimon, Armchair Athlete in His Own Race
